snippet.title: Portal: Prelude RTX | A Stunning Fully Ray-Traced Remaster of the Iconic Portal Mod
snippet.description:
Portal: Prelude RTX is launching July 18 with full ray tracing, DLSS 3 and RTX IO. 
Learn more about Portal: Prelude RTX: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/news/portal-prelude-rtx-available-now-for-free

Remastered with RTX Remix, Portal: Prelude RTX adds full ray tracing, the groundbreaking AI-accelerated performance of NVIDIA DLSS 3, and the lowest texture load times with RTX IO. It also features hundreds of new, fully upgraded materials and assets from David “Kralich” Driver-Gomm and Valerios “Fearell_Val” Tsoumpas, new voice acting by Jack “Amicus” McDade and Colin “SordidSpectacle” Zachariasen, and gameplay improvements from Nicolas. Portal: Prelude RTX is the definitive way to play the award winning mod.

Publisher
Nicolas “NykO18” Grevet
David “Kralich” Driver-Gomm

Developer
Nicolas “NykO18” Grevet
David “Kralich” Driver-Gomm


Subscribe to GeForce! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL-g3eGJi1omSDSz48AML-g 

GeForce Twitter: https://twitter.com/NVIDIAGeForce 
GeForce Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nvidiageforce/ 
GeForce TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@nvidiageforce
GeForce Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NVIDIAGeForce/
GeForce Community Portal: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/community-portal/

#PortalRTX
#PortalPrelude
#DLSS3 
#RTXIO
